title: Strengthening Machine Learning Practical Competencies: Advanced Cardiovascular Medicine Course Utilizing Basics-Clinical Integrated Flipped Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level knowledge and practical experience in the relevant field
context.additional_context: Advanced AI/machine learning technical course for AI/ML practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can explain the basic medical mechanisms of ECG/imaging findings related to clinical symptoms with 80% accuracy
Learners will be able to develop treatment plans reflecting the pathophysiology of cardiac patients in VR simulation environments
Learners can apply basic medical knowledge acquired through flipped learning to clinical case analyses and derive valid conclusions at least twice out of three attempts
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
